item.description: For those who would like to kayak but do not own one, you can rent one from Great River Outfitters. They will shuttle us up to Sumner Falls and we kayak back down which is about a 2 hour trip, but you can dawdle all you want. Harpoon is right next door if anyone wants to grab lunch, a tour, or just some drinks afterwards. It is $25 for the renting trip. If you have your own kayak but would like them to shuttle it up for you it costs $20. But maybe people with their own could carpool and work out something to save the money.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Kayak the Connecticut River with lunch/drinks after at Harpoon
